__e: In my shoes, wouldn't you first try to make it on your own?
I just wanted to hold down a job and find somebody crazy enough to marry me, like your mother.
He said he was working full-time, and money was not an issue.
NO. TAKE IT. THIS IS GONNA BE EPIC.
If you have a real girlfriend by the time of the wedding,
So you just assume that I won't have a serious partner by then?
I mean, maybe I'm just not a serious relationship kind of guy.
Yes. I said I was sad and I missed you but that I wasn't ready for a steady relationship.
You expect us to believe that a woman only wants sex, but a man wants a commitment?
We are going to have you eating solid food in a day or two.
I should be back on solid food two, three years.
I remember when you were a baby, and you first started eating solid food, the spoon never got near your mouth, you had applesauce all over your hair.
I have lived alone for quite some time now. And in addition to that, my children need a firm hand, a father, as well.
I think it's more important that they see your steady hand.
Just needs a firm hand, is all.
